Verses: 1 appozhudhu Pradhaana Aasaariyanaagiya Eliyaaseebum, Avan Sagodhararaagiya Aasaariyargalum Ezhundhu Aattuvaasalaik Kattinaargal; Adhaik Katti, Avargal Pradhishtaipanni, Adhin Kadhavugalai Vaiththu, Meyaa Engira Kommai Mudhal Anaaneyelin Kommaimattum Kattip Pradhishtaipanninaargal.
2 avan Aruge Erigovin Manushar Kattinaargal, Avargal Aruge Imriyin Kumaaranaagiya Sakkoor Kattinaan.
3 meenvaasalai Asenaavin Kumaarar Kattinaargal; Adharku Uththarampaavi, Adharkuk Kadhavugalaiyum Poottugalaiyum Thaazhppaalgalaiyum Pottaargal.

4 avargal Aruge Kosin Kumaaranaagiya Uriyaavin Magan Meremodh Pazhudhupaarththuk Kattinaan; Avargal Aruge Meshesaabeyelin Kumaaranaagiya Peragiyaavin Magan Mesullaam Pazhudhupaarththuk Kattinaan; Avargal Aruge Paanaavin Kumaaranaagiya Saadhok Pazhudhupaarththuk Kattinaan.
5 avargal Aruge Thekkovaa Ooraar Pazhudhupaarththuk Kattinaargal; Avargaludaiya Prabukkalo, Thangal Aandavarudaiya Velaikkuth Thangal Kazhuththaik Kodukkavillai.
